records.name: Aliran Dhangethi

descriptions.direction: Dhangethi is home to Perla Dhangethi. The area's natural beauty can be seen at Ari Atoll and Dhangethi Beach. Looking to get your feet wet? Snorkeling, windsurfing and fishing adventures can be found near the property.
descriptions.general: Relax at Perla Dhangethi in Dhangethi, a beachfront hotel just a 3-minute walk from Dhangethi Beach. Enjoy the outdoor pool and fitness center, or grab a meal at the restaurant or a snack at the coffee shop. Each of the 14 individually decorated guestrooms features a minibar, Smart TV, memory foam bed, and a private balcony or patio. Complimentary Wi-Fi and rainfall showers are also included. The hotel provides concierge and wedding services, express check-out, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. An airport shuttle is available for a surcharge. Nearby attractions include Kuda Miskiy, Dhangethi Port, Bikini Beach, and Bunbaru Public Beach. Perla Dhangethi is located within the Ari Atoll region.

Nearby attractions include Kuda Miskiy, Dhangethi Port, Bikini Beach, and Bunbaru Public Beach. Perla Dhangethi is located within the Ari Atoll region.

records.short_description: Excellent hotel. Awesome vibe. Great pool.
